long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yobama ;)

This extension allows users to replace all images on web pages with Yobama, providing a more personalized and visually appealing browsing experience. Users can see Yobama on their screen. The extension is designed to be easy to use and compatible with most websites, while also respecting user privacy by not collecting or transmitting any personal information
